          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Creative Writing - Introduction</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Writing - Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreatives Schreiben - Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture Créatrice - Introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita Creativa - Introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura Creativa - Introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργικό γράψιμο - εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escritura Creativa - Introducción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">PurposeTo read and understand prose from different eras and parts of the English speaking world. To create prose using Process Writing. Modul 3 - Writing.Ingår i Engelska B - CFL.</string>
            <string language="en">Purpose

To read wild duck understand prose pious different era's wild duck party's of the English speaking world. To create prose using process Writing. 

Module 3 - Writing.

Is included in English B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Engelska B</string>
            <string language="sv">engelska</string>
            <string language="sv">English B</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>
            <string language="sv">writing</string>
            <string language="sv">creative writing</string>
            <string language="sv">prose</string>

            <string language="en">creative writing</string>
            <string language="en">prose</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PurposeTo las wilde Ente verstehen 
EntePartei der pious unterschiedlichen Ära der Prosa wilde 
der englischsprechenden Welt. Prosa mit Prozeßschreiben 
erstellen. Modul 3 - Writing.Is eingeschlossen in 
englischem B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">PurposeTo a lu le canard sauvage comprennent la 
partie sauvage du canard de l'ère différente pieuse de prose du 
monde d'expression anglaise. Pour créer la prose en utilisant 
l'écriture de processus. Module 3 - Writing.Is inclus 
dans B anglais - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">PurposeTo leu o pato selvagem compreende o 
partido selvagem do pato da era diferente pious da prosa do mundo 
falador inglês. Para criar a prosa usando a escrita process. 
Módulo 3 - Writing.Is incluído em B inglês - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">PurposeTo ha letto l'anatra selvaggia capisce il 
partito selvaggio dell'anatra dell'era differente pious di prosa del 
mondo anglofono. Per creare prosa usando scrittura trattata. 
Modulo 3 - Writing.Is incluso in B inglese - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαβασμένη η PurposeTo άγρια πάπια καταλαβαίνει την
πεζογραφία του άγριου συμβαλλόμενου μέρους παπιών της ευσεβούς 
διαφορετικής εποχής του αγγλόφωνου κόσμου. Για να 
δημιουργήσει την πεζογραφία που χρησιμοποιεί το γράψιμο 
διαδικασίας. Ενότητα 3 - που γράφει συμπεριλαμβάνεται στο 
αγγλικό β - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">PurposeTo leyó el pato salvaje entiende el 
partido salvaje del pato de diversa era piadosa de la prosa del mundo 
de discurso inglés. Para crear prosa usando la escritura de 
proceso. Módulo 3 - Writing.Is incluido en B inglés - 
CFL.</string>
          </description>
